info.da: Vis ved deling af link på sociale medier. [Få mere at vide](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) om miniminiaturer.
info.de: Wird angezeigt, wenn ein Link in den sozialen Medien geteilt wird. [Mehr Infos](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) über Bild-Miniaturansichten.
info.en: Shown when sharing a link on social media. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) about image thumbnails.
info.es: Aparece cuando se comparte un enlace en una red social. [Más información](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) acerca de las miniaturas
info.fi: Näkyy, kun jaat linkin sosiaaliseen mediaan. [Lisätietoja](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) tietoa pikkukuvista.
info.fr: Affichée lorsqu'un lien est partagé sur les réseaux sociaux. [En savoir plus](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) sur les images miniatures.
info.hi: सोशल मीडिया पर लिंक शेयर करते समय दिखाना. [अधिक जानें](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) इमेज थंबनेल के बारे
info.it: Mostrata quando si condivide un link sui social media. [Maggiori informazioni](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) sulle immagini di anteprima.
info.ja: SNSでリンクがシェアされると表示されます。[詳細情報](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/)画像のサムネイルについては、上のリンクを参照してください。
info.ko: 소셜 미디어에서 링크 공유 시 표시 [자세히 보기](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) 이미지 썸네일에 대해
info.nb: Vist når en kobling deles i sosiale medier. [Finn ut mer](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) om miniatyrbilder.
info.nl: Wordt weergegeven wanneer u een link deelt via social media. [Meer informatie](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) over miniatuurafbeeldingen.
info.pt-BR: Apresentada ao compartilhar um link nas redes sociais. [Saiba mais](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) sobre miniaturas de imagens.
info.pt-PT: Apresentada ao partilhar uma ligação nas redes sociais. [Saiba mais](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) sobre miniaturas de imagem.
info.sv: Visas när du delar en länk på sociala medier. [Läs mer](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) om miniatyrbilder.
info.th: แสดงเมื่อแชร์ลิงก์บนโซเชียลมีเดีย [ดูข้อมูลเพิ่มเติม](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) เกี่ยวกับรูปภาพขนาดย่อ
info.zh-CN: 在社交媒体上分享链接时显示。[了解有关图片缩略图的详细信息](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/)。
info.zh-TW: 在社群媒體上分享連結時顯示。[深入瞭解](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/)圖片縮圖的相關資訊。

label.th: แสดงเศษในรูปแบบตัวยก

info.da: Denne indstilling træder ikke i kraft, hvis du bruger en [currency selector](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) eller et format, der anvender punktum før tallet. For eksempel: 1.000,00 DKK. [More info.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.de: Diese Einstellung gilt nicht, wenn Sie eine [Währungsauswahl](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) oder ein Format verwenden, das einen Punkt vor der Zahl verwendet. Zum Beispiel: RS.1,000.00. [Mehr Infos.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.en: This setting won't apply if you're using a [currency selector](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) or format that includes a period before the number. For example: RS.1,000.00. [More info.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.es: Esta configuración no se aplicará si estás utilizando un [selector de monedas](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) o un formato que incluya un punto antes del número. Por ejemplo: RS.1,000.00. [Más información](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.fi: Tätä asetusta ei sovelleta, jos käytössäsi on [valuuttavalitsin](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) tai muotoilu, jossa on piste ennen numeroa. Esimerkiksi: RS. 1000,00. [Lisätietoja.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.fr: Ce paramètre ne s'applique pas si vous utilisez un [sélecteur de devise](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) ou un format comportant une virgule avant le nombre. Par exemple : RS.1,000.00. [Plus d'infos.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.hi: यदि आप [currency selector](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) का उपयोग कर रहे हैं तो यह सेटिंग लागू नहीं होगी या प्रारूप जिसमें संख्या से पहले की अवधि शामिल है. उदाहरण के लिए: RS.1,000.00. [अधिक जानकारीके लिए.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.it: Questa impostazione non verrà applicata se utilizzi un [selettore di valuta](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) o formato che include un punto prima del numero. Ad esempio: RS.1,000.00. [Maggiori informazioni](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.ja: この設定は、[通貨選択](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies)、または数値の前にピリオドを含むフォーマットを使用している場合には適用されません。例: RS.1,000.00.[詳細情報](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.ko: 이 설정은 [통화 선택기]를 사용하는 경우에는 적용되지 않습니다.(https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) 또는 숫자 앞에 마침표가 포함된 형식에도 적용되지 않습니다. 예: RS.1,000.00. [자세히 알아보기](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.nb: Denne innstillingen gjelder ikke hvis du bruker en [valutavelger](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) eller format som inkluderer et punktum før tallet. For eksempel: RS. 1.000,00. [Mer info.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.nl: Deze instelling is niet van toepassing als u een [valutakiezer](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) gebruikt of indeling die een periode vóór het nummer bevat. Bijvoorbeeld: RS.1.000,00. [Meer informatie.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.pt-BR: Esta configuração não se aplica se você estiver usando um [seletor de moeda](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) ou formato que inclua um ponto antes do número. Por exemplo: RS.1.000,00. [Mais informações](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.pt-PT: Esta definição não se aplica se estiver a utilizar um [seletor de moeda](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) ou formato que inclua um ponto antes do número. Por exemplo: RS.1.000,00. [Mais informações](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.sv: Den här inställningen gäller inte om du använder en [valutaväljare](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) eller format som innehåller en period före numret. Till exempel: RS.1000,00. [Mer information.](Https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.th: จะไม่ปรับใช้การตั้งค่านี้หากคุณใช้ [ตัวเลือกสกุลเงิน](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) หรือรูปแบบที่มีจุดก่อนหน้าตัวเลข เช่น: RS.1,000.00 [ดูข้อมูลเพิ่มเติม](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.zh-CN: 如果您要使用 [货币选择器](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies) 或数字前含有句点的格式（例如 RS.1,000.00），则此设置不适用。[详细信息](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
info.zh-TW: 如果您使用 [幣別選擇器](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/switch-between-two-currencies)或數字前方帶有英文句點的格式，則無法套用此設定。例如：RS.1,000.00。[更多資訊](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/themes-by-shopify/supply#price-format-general-settings-specific)
